Two friends reused primes while issuing RSA keys. Their encrypted secret is: ciphertext1: 1883057928242568112844112132160855695836068176246158015010456180350320534540702099708736814591349420733412237407866037611304948517269903331643823909632730, ciphertext2: 5062408664394590706666059424780937670106134839444716859239431152060323029809610197508326178821049446240690314973428660714655465766834822634920393350603421. Recover the hidden message by exploiting their carelessness.

The flag format is flag{...}
n1=6385531798402649131790452166001681841918926917675799989098937242621311402417915985872383267585046721485949250831927628357374319597606571171636379570595337, n2=6276455271231306825340036886356226053759496634258000515082703948520127391774224488285369679504447514041889588480474190810543145142902695406156825090672373, e=1888919037337887429539556021586541238438183845193405008870679023045347133348151946989670557051303080101258514948485872475831964742420030663981233932028539

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{p8hqwr62}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 1883057928242568112844112132160855695836068176246158015010456180350320534540702099708736814591349420733412237407866037611304948517269903331643823909632730, ciphertext2: 5062408664394590706666059424780937670106134839444716859239431152060323029809610197508326178821049446240690314973428660714655465766834822634920393350603421
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=6385531798402649131790452166001681841918926917675799989098937242621311402417915985872383267585046721485949250831927628357374319597606571171636379570595337, n2=6276455271231306825340036886356226053759496634258000515082703948520127391774224488285369679504447514041889588480474190810543145142902695406156825090672373, e=1888919037337887429539556021586541238438183845193405008870679023045347133348151946989670557051303080101258514948485872475831964742420030663981233932028539
extra_info: p=103143473010473914267578278008340431775861336929126388397761080845456008525149, q=61909218412242307235164048017550810276622028616656090146164992761355325971613, r=101381594408728025527739480922146873188926395217943386809384966892968387774521, φ(n1)=6385531798402649131790452166001681841918926917675799989098937242621311402417750933180960551363543979159923359589875144991828537119062645098029568236098576, φ(n2)=6276455271231306825340036886356226053759496634258000515082703948520127391774061197472548709171684610512949890797008642386708545665947145446502501376926240
